name: d3-weighted-voronoi
description: D3 plugin which computes a Weighted Voronoi tesselation
author: Kcnarf <fl.franck.lebeau@gmail.com>

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js -- index.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/utils.js -- ./src/utils.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/plane3D.js -- ./src/plane3D.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/conflictList.js -- ./src/conflictList.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vertex.js -- ./src/vertex.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vector.js -- ./src/vector.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/hEdge.js -- ./src/hEdge.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/face.js -- ./src/face.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/convexHull.js -- ./src/convexHull.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/powerDiagram.js -- ./src/powerDiagram.js
scripts.build: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js -c -m -o build/d3-weighted-voronoi.min.js
